articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Exhibition of Military Science and Technology
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Exhibition of Military Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited the 26th Exhibition of Military Science and Technology of the KPA. 
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Jae Il, Kim Myong Guk, Yun Tong Hyon, Jon Chang Bok and Pak Jong Chon.
					
					 He first learned about the reconstruction of the exhibition on a modern basis. 
					
					 He praised the soldier-builders for having splendidly reconstructed the exhibition by successfully building its exterior and interior to suit its characteristics as an exhibition of science and technology by their own efforts and with indigenous technology.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the successful reconstruction and modernization of the exhibition as required by the Songun era has created an important center for widely studying and introducing the military scientific and technological achievements made thanks to the direct initiative of President Kim Il Sung and under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Then he, conducted by officials, made the rounds of the first and second floors and outdoor exhibition to acquaint himself in detail with the scientific and technological work within the KPA.
					
					 It is very good that service personnel, scientists, technicians and researchers of the KPA have made through their researches a lot of valuable inventions and devices urgently needed for the combat preparations of the KPA by displaying collective wisdom and creative ingenuity and presented them to the current exhibition, he said.
					
					 Seeing the inventions and devices presented to the exhibition, I can realize that the KPA is working hard to settle scientific and technological issues related to the combat preparations true to the intention of the WPK to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology, he noted.
					
					 He repeatedly praised the scientists, technicians, researchers and service personnel of the KPA for their laudable achievements, noting that they have conducted strenuous scientific researches conducive to stepping up the combat preparations of the KPA and improving the standard of soldiers and people's living by displaying their burning revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity in the past. 
					
					 He gave precious instructions for further developing science and technology within the KPA as required by the new century.
					
					 He underscored the need to get mastery of latest science and technology in order to ensure that the level of military science and technology of the KPA surpasses the worldwide level of military science and technology and they will develop fast.
					
					 The KPA should display according to different sectors inventions and devices highly estimated and selected stage by stage in different sectors including units at various levels and military academies and put the operation of the exhibition on a normal basis as it has been wonderfully rebuilt and modernized.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the current exhibition would mark an important occasion in making a positive contribution to putting spurs to the development of science and technology of the KPA, rounding off the combat preparations and improving the standard of soldiers and people's living.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Grand Magic Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Grand Magic Performance
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed with citizens of Pyongyang the grand magic performance "For All Eternity" given by the KPA Circus.
					 Put on the stage were numbers of illusionary and movie jugglery.
					
					 The performers presented tricks of making optical changes of objects in space-time.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing Juche-oriented acrobatic art, a powerful means for politico-ideological, cultural and emotional education of people.
					
					 Enjoying the performance were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Choe Pu Il, Kim Yong Chol and labor innovators of major industrial establishments, teachers and researchers of universities, officials of dongs of districts, exemplary heads of their people's neighborhood units and party cell secretaries in Pyongyang and other citizens.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lebanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lebanese President
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Lebanese President Michel Suleiman on April 25.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I most sincerely hope that you would lead your country along the way of independence and progress, and wish your people well-being and peace.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Party Leaders
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on April 23 received a congratulatory message from General Chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle Megawati Soekarnoputri and its Secretary General Tjahjo Kumolo.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept our tribute to you.
					
					 All the members of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle extend heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency upon holding of His Excellency Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever and upon Your Excellency's election as first secretary of the WPK and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK at the Fourth WPK Conference on April 11, 2012 in reflection of the unanimous faith, desire and loyalty of all the party members, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the people.
					
					 We also extend the warmest congratulations to Your Excellency upon your election as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission at the Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly on April 13, 2012 and, availing ourselves of this opportunity, warmly congratulate the 80th anniversary of the founding of the KPA on April 25, 2012.
					
					 We wish Your Excellency good health and happiness for the welfare and prosperity of the Korean nation, convinced that the Korean people will certainly build a prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Your Excellency.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we would like to express the hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the WPK will grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Sunday by Zhou Wei.

articles.title: DPRK Workers Vow to Wipe out Rat-like Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Vow to Wipe out Rat-like Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Mass meetings took place at industrial establishments across the DPRK to wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group to the last man in this land and sky as it is committing the worst crimes.
					 A statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said: Unpardonable are the rat-like group's most evil acts of hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 It is the unanimous resolution of the workers to throw the aged traitors more dead than alive and rat-like bastards into boilers of power stations or put them on rails to be driven over by trains.
					
					 We will bring about signal innovations in production and construction, each holding arms in one hand or a hammer in the other, and if an order is issued, we will bring sledgehammers down on the heads of rat-like hooligans of Chongwadae till they perish.
					
					 The sacred retaliatory war of justice to punish the rat-like Lee group for committing hideous provocations to the nation will go on, they declared.

articles.title: Hwangbong Mine Goes Operational
articles.content:
Hwangbong Mine Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Hwangbong Mine in South Hamgyong Province went operational with due ceremony on Sunday. 
					 The builders created a series of open-cast mining sites to secure a huge mining capacity and, at the same time, completed the project for laying a power transmission line and wound up the construction of the roads leading to mining sites. There sprang up new dwelling houses and cultural and welfare facilities to build a modern village for miners. 
					
					 The commissioning of the mine made it possible to contribute to the nation's economic development and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il clearly indicated a specific orientation and ways of developing the mine. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un acquainted himself with the construction of the mine and showed great loving care for the officials, builders and members of a shock brigade who performed labor feats.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Biggest Nuclear Criminal State
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Biggest Nuclear Criminal State
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The United States is advocating a "world without nuclear weapons" and letting loose rhetoric that it will spearhead the struggle for building it. But it is the world's biggest nuclear criminal. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					 The article cites concrete facts to prove that the U.S. is the biggest criminal that inflicted nuclear disasters upon mankind and triggered off a nuclear arms race in the world.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless maneuvers for a nuclear war have brought the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula and posed a constant threat of a nuclear war to the Korean people. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' evermore undisguised nuclear blackmail compelled the DPRK to bolster its capability for self-defence. As a result, it won victories in the nuclear standoff with the U.S. and ensured the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 In view of the U.S. nuclear threat not only countries around the peninsula but anti-imperialist independent countries have bolstered the defence capabilities and strengthened the means for strategic deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. is disturbing the normal relations among nations with its double-dealing nuclear policy and creating complexity in the international arena.
					
					 The U.S. is conniving and patronizing the development of nuclear weapons by its junior allies while labeling the peaceful nuclear activities of the countries desirous of independence against imperialism as "development of nuclear weapons". It is even contemplating a military attack on them, not content with ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on them in collusion with those allies. This is a manifestation of the intolerable U.S. double standards.
					
					 This is, at the same time, a product of the U.S. scenario for world domination.
					
					 If mankind is to live in a nuclear-free world, it should hold in check and frustrate the U.S. moves for a nuclear war.

articles.title: Release of Pro-reunification Champions Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Pro-reunification Champions Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on April 25 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their suppression of pro-reunification figures.
					 The statement accused the authorities of staging trials of Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the headquarters, Ri Kyong Won, its former secretary-general, and Choe Un A, its former chairperson for publicity, on the same day. 
					
					 It demanded an immediate release of the patriotic figures who devoted themselves to the nation. 
					
					 A big nationwide united front was formed for actions against Lee Myung Bak and all Koreans in the south, north and abroad kicked off practical actions to punish the group of traitors, the statement said.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak had better give up his intention to kill people but think about his own plight in which he is no longer able to survive due to the crimes he committed against the nation, it added.
					
					 It declared that the nation would mercilessly punish Lee Myung Bak keen on his gangster-like policy, policy of confrontation and war and policy of irregularities and corruption, adding that it will never pardon those who go reckless as hounds of the dictatorial regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses True Colors of Party of Traitors
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses True Colors of Party of Traitors
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on April 25 carried an editorial flaying the "Saenuri Party's" arrogant and high-handed practices.
					 The party is talking about the settlement of the issue of people's living but its deeds do not match its words, the editorial said.
					
					 A fierce strife is going on between pro-Lee Myung Bak faction and pro-Park Geun Hye faction within the party everyday over the nomination of candidate for "president", it noted, adding this would put the bills related to people's living in the danger of massive cancellation.
					
					 Park, in particular, is busy stumping for "presidential" election and advertising her willingness to fulfill her commitment to people's living. However, she turns her face away from important issues related to it. This is hypocrisy, it stressed.
					
					 Damage done by pro-Park Geun Hye forces since the "general election" is manifested in different places, it deplored.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Farmers' Organizations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced by Farmers' Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- At least 40 farmers' organizations including the Farmers, Fishermen and Stock Breeders Association and the Peasants' Solidarity of south Korea held a press conference in Kwachon, Kyonggi Province on April 27 in protest against the puppet authorities' import of American beef infected with mad cow disease, according to south Korean KBS.
					 Speakers at the press conference denounced Lee Myung Bak for not taking any measure as regards the import of American beef despite the occurrence of mad cow disease in the U.S.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop the import of the beef, though belatedly.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group in Embarrassing Position
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group in Embarrassing Position
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS on April 25 ridiculed the puppet Lee Myung Bak group driven into a tight corner.
					 It reported that the recent disclosure of a series of scandals of Choe Si Jung and other confidants of Lee Myung Bak has thrown Chongwadae into uneasiness.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 These guys are set to be judged in the wake of their ouster from office for their scandals that sparked off social uproar.
					
					 Their crimes are likely to be treated as hideous cases as they were deeply involved not only in the "presidential" election but in state administration in the past. This is increasing the anxiety of Chongwadae about its ruin and judgment.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of KPA Observed by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of KPA Observed by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Thongil, newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, carried a special write-up on April 24 on the 80th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The paper carried photos showing the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu under the title "The KPA Marks its 80th founding anniversary on April 25".

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition for celebrating the Day of the Sun took place in Dalian City, Liaoning Province of China from April 18 to 26.
					 Electronic displays portraying the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae and letters "1912-2012" with the rising sun in the background were seen at the venue. Also standing there were electronic displays introducing world horticultural expos and international floricultural shows which awarded best prizes to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia as well as flower festivals and exhibitions held in the DPRK and various countries.
					
					 Hundreds of potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias were on view, fascinating the visitors.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony on invitation were figures and citizens from all walks of life in Dalian City, the consul general and members of the Consulate General of the DPRK in Shenyang and the delegation of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee of Korea.
					
					 A lot of Dalian citizens visited the exhibition during the period.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Hideous Crimes under Fire in Peru
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors′ Hideous Crimes under Fire in Peru
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Peru condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its hideous provocation against the DPRK.
					The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute said in a joint statement on April 21:
					
					All the progressives, political parties and organizations of the world significantly celebrated the Day of the Sun, praising the great sun of mankind. But puppet Lee Myung Bak committed such hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the sun, going against this trend. Lee's reckless acts are sparking off the resentment of not only the Korean people but of the people of all countries including Peru.
					
					The DPRK is an ever-victorious power with tremendous military capability and economic potential. Under the wise guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader, the fraternal Korean people will dynamically advance for peace and prosperity while shattering any provocation.
					
					The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in a statement on April 19 noted that the Lee Myung Bak puppet group of traitors perpetrated again such hideous crime as defaming the celebrations of the Day of the Sun. The statement went on:
					
					What the Lee group committed is high treason unpardonable in any part of the world.
					
					We vehemently denounce the Lee group of traitors for its hideous crimes and fully support the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organization which declared a stern punishment to the group.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Celebrations of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung were held in different countries. 
					 Colorful events included meetings, receptions, remembrance meetings, lectures, reading sessions that took place in Chile, Mongolia, Zimbabwe, Mali, Sweden, Spain and Slovakia from April 12 to 16.
					
					 They were attended by personages of various circles and other people in their respective countries.
					
					 The first secretary of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) at a celebration meeting referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a socialist state centered on the popular masses, a politico-ideological power and military power to which the whole world looks up.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the State Great Hural of Mongolia said at a reception that the Korean people were significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun, proud of having achieved great successes in building a socialist thriving nation.
					
					 The secretary general of the Malian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a lecture that Kim Il Sung's august name was shining as a symbol of the struggle for national liberation, the era of independence, noble virtues and sense of obligation and an eternal banner for victory.
					
					 A letter and congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Zimbabwe and Spain.

articles.title: Papers of Different Countries Observe Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Papers of Different Countries Observe Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Papers of different countries carried articles commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The Vietnamese paper Nhan Dan on April 15 said under the title "The DPRK is advancing along the road indicated by President Kim Il Sung" that Kim Il Sung liberated the country from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialist, defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War and built a socialist system on this land.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on April 15 in an article dealing with the feats performed by him to be recorded in the world history, saying that he was a legendary hero, military genius and iron-willed brilliant commander. 
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on April 10 said under the title "President Kim Il Sung, holding aloft the banner of independence" that he made a great contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Czech paper Dialog in its April issue said under the title "Comrade Kim Il Sung will be immortal" that he built a socialist state serving the popular masses under the uplifted banner of Juche.
					
					 The Namibian paper New Era on April 12 praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea, clearly indicating the road to be followed by mankind and making a great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Senegalese paper Robs on April 14 and Indonesian paper The First Times on April 7 carried articles introducing his sacred revolutionary career which was totally dedicated to the country, revolution and its people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Will Be Alive as Sun: Czech Association
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Will Be Alive as Sun: Czech Association
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association issued a special information bulletin on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin carried articles together with photos of revolutionary activities of the President, photo of the President standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and photos of Pyongyang that has undergone change.
					
					 An article titled "The sun will be eternal" said in detail that the President achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation, defeated the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion and built socialism centered on the popular masses on this land under the uplifted banner of Juche, banner of Songun.
					
					 The President illumined the way ahead of the world progressives in their anti-imperialist struggle and instilled conviction of the victory of socialism into the people when socialism faced a setback in several countries later last century, the bulletin said, adding:
					
					 All those who were received by the President deeply admired his traits.
					
					 The President was revered by lots of statesmen of the world.
					
					 Former U.S. President Jimmy Carter praised Kim Il Sung as a man greater than three U.S. presidents who represented the building and destiny of the U.S.
					
					 Even though Kim Il Sung passed away, he will always be with humankind as the great sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Reported by Syrian Radio
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Reported by Syrian Radio
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was reported by Syria TV Channel and Radio of Syria on April 15.
					 The TV showed scenes of the President and leader Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the work in different domains of the national economy and conducting external activities and scenes of the dear respected Kim Jong Un conducing revolutionary activities.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Organ of British Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Organ of British Political Party
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The April-May issue of Proletarian, the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist－Leninist), carried the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "The Great Anti-Imperialist Revolutionary Cause of the Asian, African and Latin-American Peoples Is Invincible". 
					 The work, published on October 8, 1968, deals with the victory of the Cuban revolution and the issue arising in consolidating it.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career and Feats Introduced Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career and Feats Introduced Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Radio and TV broadcasting services of different countries aired special programs between April 8 and 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Syrian Central TV Broadcasting Service showed scenes of the President and leader Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the work in different domains of the national economy and conducting external activities.
					
					 The Syrian Radio Broadcasting Service in a program titled "On the centenary of birth of the great President Kim Il Sung" dealt with the sacred revolutionary career of the President and the Songun leadership feats performed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The domestic channel of the broadcasting service of Guinea dealt in detail with the revolutionary history of the President who greatly contributed to the liberation of Korea, socialist construction and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The international channel and the Seven Languages channel of the Radio Broadcasting Service of Guinea aired the similar program.
					
					 The Renaissance Radio Broadcasting Service of the country under the title "Blooming Kimilsungia" repeatedly aired for six days a program dealing with the background against which the flower of the sun bearing the august name of the peerlessly great man came into being. 
					
					 TV Broadcasting Service of Equatorial Guinea showed a portrait of the President and aired in four installments a program praising Kim Il Sung for liberating Korea, founding the DPRK and performing feats in the struggle for the freedom and independence of the world oppressed people.
					
					 A radio broadcasting service of Guinea aired the similar program in five installments.
					
					 The State Radio of Cambodia, UBC Radio of Uganda and TV Asian News Channel of Singapore introduced in detail the undying feats the President performed for the era and history and the reality of the daily developing DPRK.

articles.title: French Magazine Carries Article on Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
French Magazine Carries Article on Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- French magazine Le Point carried an article on Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK.
					 It said that young leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un displayed his affinity in the military parade celebrating the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, father of modern Korea.
					
					 With a broad smile all over his face, Kim Jong Un waved back for a long while to the applauding soldiers and masses who took part in the military parade in celebration of the 100th Day of the Sun, the article said, and went on:
					
					 In the live-televised event he made a congratulatory speech, encouraging the army and people.
					
					 He looked tested and experienced when he ended his speech with phrase "Forward for Final Victory!"
					
					 Lots of world observers were much surprised by the tested and friendly traits of the young leader of the DPRK.
					
					 Experts on north Korean Affairs were unanimous in saying that Kim Jong Un apparently displayed his charisma and attraction at the celebrations for the 100th anniversary of the birth of the President.
					
					 A European diplomat who was received by Kim Jong Un in Pyongyang recently said that it is true that he has charisma, adding he looked majestic.
					
					 A south Korean expert said that though young, Kim Jong Un is a tested and dauntless man with a wealth of experience.

articles.title: Thai Personage Praises Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Thai Personage Praises Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the organization for the study of the Juche idea which visited the DPRK on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 22 held a meeting on the visit and a film show in Ayuthaya Province of Thailand.
					 The chairman of the organization at the meeting gave his impressions of the participation in the events held for celebrating the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as follows:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is identical to great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership, personality, virtues and traits.
					
					 He is a great man who has perfectly personified the Juche idea, Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A rosy future is in store for the Korean people as they have young Kim Jong Un at the top posts of their party, state and army.
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK which made it possible for its army to be a main force not only defending the country but carrying out the overall socialist construction serves as an all-powerful treasured sword for winning every victory as the only political mode in the world.

articles.title: Strained Relations between Sudan and South Sudan
articles.content:
Strained Relations between Sudan and South Sudan
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The relations between Sudan and South Sudan are now inching close to the brink of a war.
					 On April 10 Sudanese army attacked Heglig oil field in South Kordofan State bordering South Sudan and seized a lot of war materials and captured many troops of the Sudan People's Liberation Army (SPLM).
					
					 Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir in a TV speech on April 19 said that everything will not be over with occupation of Heglig and "fighting is the only way to resolve differences with South Sudan."
					
					 The past disputes between Sudan and South Sudan were sparked off by foreign forces coveting for natural resources. They left two million dead and produced four million refugees for the past two decades until South Sudan's independence.
					
					 The international community hopes that both sides will settle the bilateral issues by themselves free from outside interference through dialogue at an early date.
